description: HTML page for a database visualizer UI with embedded CSS and JavaScript for dynamic loading and interaction with database data.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list by reloading data.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Toggles display of tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays tables within a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and renders data for a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Constructs HTML to display data table.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Creates individual cell content, handling objects, nulls, and long strings.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for lengthy or object data.
